=== About Me ===

 I am a Lead Software Engineer at Canonical, Ltd, specializing in BIOS architecture and ACPI & platform subsystems in Linux kernel. I am also a maintainer of firmware test suite (FWTS), and an active member in UEFI Testing Working Group (UTWG).
